wikipedia_page.main: Edward Morris  (born 1872) was a Welsh international footballer. He was part of the Wales national football team, playing 3 matches. He played his first match on 13 March 1893 against England and his last match on 5 April 1893 against Ireland.

response: * Edward Morris (businessman) (1866–1913), president of Morris & Company
* Edward Morris, 1st Baron Morris (1859–1935), lawyer and Prime Minister of Newfoundland
